1212.content:
-Meanwhile, a little earlier-

"Moooom, can I get something to eat??? I'm huuungrryy!!" A young boy groaned as he tugged at his mother's shirt. The woman pulled out a five dollar bill from her purse and handed it over to the antsy kid.

"THANKS MOM!" The boy smiled widely as he ran over to the nearby concession stand, already contemplating what he wanted to eat.

After a short wait on line, the hungry child walked up next to the high counter. It was tall enough that the boy had to stand on his tippy toes just to read the menu across the back-wall. Scanning the menu with ravenous desire, he eventually spotted the 'hotdog' item.

"Can I have a hotdog please??" The boy chirped eagerly to the man behind the counter.

"Sure thing champ" The man responded as he took the boy's 5 dollar bill. After quick transaction, the man slowly handed the hotdog over to the hungry youth, who was now hopping up and down excitedly, his hands already outstretched to receive his lunch. The boy's stomach let out a soft, high-pitched gurgle as he watched the hotdog carried over to his direction.

The inside of the kid's mouth began to salivate as he grabbed onto the warm snack. His eyes glimmered with unsatisfied hunger as he raised the hotdog to his widening mouth.

"Oops, I forgot the ketchup and mustard!" The boy thought to himself as he pulled the uneaten hotdog away from his maw.

Quickly reaching over to the counter, the boy grabbed a bottle of ketchup and mustard. Quickly spraying thick layers of across the surface of the hotdog, the kid didn't notice an unusual looking speck before covering it with a thick coating of red and yellow.

This was it, the boy simply couldn't hold back his appetite any longer. Licking his lips, he prepared to stuff his face.

-----

You could only watch in total horror as the enormous face of the unknown boy drew closer and closer. The scent of hotdog is absolutely overwhelming as you continued to run off in the opposite direction. The surface of the smooth hotdog was already difficult to simply stand on, but with the added ketchup and mustard, you now found yourself slipping every three or four steps. Each time you looked over your shoulder, the scene playing behind you became more and more dire. Your heart seized with fear as the kid's massive wet tongue slid across the outside of his lips, signaling that the giant boy was totally oblivious to your presence on his lunch.

Had you been normal-sized, you probably would have been one or two inches taller than the colossal boy that now loomed over you.

After falling on your face for the fifth or sixth time, you were utterly exhausted. Your entire form was now completely lathered with the gooey red and yellow substances. Slowly turning yourself over, you now faced a nightmarish backdrop.

The atmosphere around you almost seemed to slow as the young boy's mouth began to open widely in front of you. The dark insides of his mouth quickly illuminated, revealing the dripping wet world beyond his lips. You could now see the entire tongue, wriggling excitedly, as if awaiting the yummy taste of hotdog.

Thick gooey stands of saliva curtained the inside of the glistening cave from pallet to tongue. Whether it be by habit or instinct, the boy emitted a high verbal "Ahhhhh~" as he brought the warm hotdog into his open mouth.

Your instinct to survive suddenly sent adrenaline through your body, causing you to snap out of the frightening trance. Your heart began to beat widely as you attempted to once again stand.

"He-HEY!! STOP!!!! WAIT NOOOO!!! I'M DOWN HERE!!!" You began to cry frantically as the shadow of the boy's mouth started to travel across the hotdog in front of you. The kid's eyes were nearly half-open and glazed. It became unnervingly obvious that the boy was now in total eating mode; there was very little hope that you could get his attention at this point.

Regardless of the logic processing through your mind, you continued to scream in hope that your pleas would be heard. Unfortunately for you, your tiny vocal chords just didn't have the strength to reach the boy's ears.

Suddenly, your entire world jolted with an abrupt ...

*CHOMP*

Not only a few feet away from you, the boy's mouth closed. You watched as the lips in front of you pulled away. The entire landscape of hotdog that had once been there was now gone.

"Mmmmmm~" The giant boy hummed as he savored the delicious hotdog. All the flavors washed across the inside of his mouth as he chewed.

Totally paralyzed with fear, you continued to stare at the boy's lips as he chewed loudly. The sloppy sounds coming from the inside of the mouth were only made worse each time the giant's lips pulled away from each other momentarily, causing wet slapping sounds as the hotdog was chewed into paste

With a slight tilt of his head, the boy emitted a loud wet gulp, sending all the contents in his mouth down into his throat. You watched his neck muscles flexed as a hardly visible lump traveled down into his collarbone.

Licking his lips once more, the boy lapped up any ketchup and mustard that had been left behind on the corners of his mouth.

Had you only been laying a few feet in front of you, you would have been a part of that lump. The horrific realization was only made worse as you looked over your shoulder at the vast plain of hotdog behind you. There was no way you were going to be able to outrun the next bite.

You weren't even able to finish your thoughts as the hungry child opened his mouth to consume the next bite of hotdog, you included. The previous bite must have added to the thickness of the boy's saliva, which was made obvious by the thicker, more numerous stands that now draped across the inside of his mouth.
---

"Sooo gooood~" The boy thought to himself as he swallowed. One bite obviously wasn't going to cut it though. The kid's tummy gurgled as he opened his mouth to happily devour the rest of the remaining hotdog.

---

"PLEASE STOP!!!! PLEASE!! NOOOOOOO!!" you cried as you passed under the mouth's shadow and a wave of the boy's hot breath washed over you.

122.title: A Cheeseburger

1222.content:
You cringed as a 12-year-old player snatched the cheeseburger and loaded it with condiments, covering you in them, then just as quickly covering the delicious burger with the top bun. Now, your vision obscured, you could not tell if the boy was going to eat you.

CHOMP. One giant bite and the boy devoured half of the cheeseburger, chewing it up and swallowing it down within seconds. You nearly flew forward as he shoved the last half in his mouth.

You couldn't even tell what was going on inside the pre-teen's mouth, as you were thoroughly covered by bun, condiments, and burger, all being mashed together. All you could do was be tortured by the boy's loud, ravenous chewing.

Suddenly, you feel yourself being pushed, and before you know it, you fall into his stomach. For a moment you think it's quite nice, if not a bit hot and humid. However, after the boy lets out a nice, big belch, suddenly the stomach has a lot less air, making it extremely hard to breathe, but you end up managing. In fact, you don't even digest. Can't say that for the burger though...it didn't stand a chance.
1222.title: A 12 year old player

12221.content:
In the confines of the 12-year-old's stomach, you stand and watch as his stomach acid slowly but steadily breaks down the unrecognizable mass of the cheeseburger. Suddenly, you feel a deep rumbling that shakes the entire chamber. Bubbles are beginning to rise out of the lake of acid, and you realize what was happening...

As the boy walked back to some of his teammates, he placed his hand over his belly as he felt a pressure rise among its busy gurgling. Knowing what was coming next, he patted his chest, and burped loudly. He smiled with relief, and let out another tiny belch, a leftover of that big one.

You struggled to breathe, as all the air was escaping the boy's stomach.

Then, he met up with his teammates.

"Dude," one of them asked, "did you bring me back something? I'm sooo hungry, and I don't have any money!"

"Nope." The boy answered. Sensing that his teammate was legitimately disappointed and starving, he rubbed in his own full-ness.

"Ooh, that burger was so good though," The boy started, feeling another belch coming on. "I think I might get another one, good thing I digest things quickly, or else I would'nt be able to fit another!" He rubbed his belly and let out that big burp in the direction of his teammate.

"What's your deal?" His teammate started to get annoyed. The boy realized, in his immature mind, he was gonna have some more fun torturing the hungry "friend" of his.

The boy lifted his shirt, revealing his full, thin frame and tall abdominal area, and grabbed his teammate's head in a strong hold, an ear pressed against the growling, rumbling stomach just about done with the cheeseburger.

You feel the impact of the teammate's head to the boy's lower abdomen, as it shakes the whole chamber around, creating more noise.

"Listen." The boy commanded, "You can almost hear its pitiful cry for help in there..." The teammate's ear was filled with digestive noises.

"There's something wrong with you, man. Let go of me!!"
12221.title: Evil Side

choices: The boy does something that affects you (eats, burps, etc.)
12222.content:
The boy's quickly-devoured hamburger wasn't enough to satisfy his giant appetite, and, as you soon hear, growls of hunger begin to sound throughout his stomach. Not wasting any time, the boy responds to these pangs of emptiness and gets another hamburger and a large soda. Wow! You'd never be able to eat this much! Is this what happens when you get older?

You watch as the mushed-up masses of the boy's second burger drop into the pool of stomach acid, and bubble up, beginning to digest. Every so often, the entire cavern is flooded with a big gulp of soda, which you do not like, as it washes you in the acid and the chewed-up food, which, while not harmful, is still very disgusting. The boy's belly doesn't mind though, as it fills with the stuff until it bulges slightly under his baseball uniform, groaning and rumbling away. His burger completely eaten and soda down to the ice cubes, the boy pats his full tummy and lets out two huge belches, which he enjoys.

About an hour later, you've sat and watched his second round of food completely digest, and now you sit in the near-empty stomach, wondering what to do. The boy is back home now.
12222.title: He goes for seconds!

122221.content:
You have to get out of here. You don't know why you haven't been digested yet, but you know you can't live in here forever. Though there is something strangely soothing about the pulsing walls of the boy's belly and the sounds of his breathing and heartbeat far above you, the incredible humidity and being waist-deep in stomach acid was far less appealing to you.

Having only a 7-year-old's understanding of biology, you figure you can simply climb the stomach walls, wiggle through the sphincter and make your way up the esophagus. Piece of cake, right?

Wrong. You slosh your way through the steaming stomach and try to get a handhold in one of the wrinkles in the stomach wall. Your hand simply slides off and you slide backward into the acid. *grrrrooooooowwwl* A gurgle echoes through the 12-year-old boy's belly, as if it's mocking your attempt to escape.

When at first you don't succeed... you try again. And again. But you can't get a grip with all the slime that the stomach is coated in.

Outside:

Sean was finishing up his shower when he felt a weird little tickle in his belly. He thumped it with his fist, wondering what there is to eat in the fridge.

Inside:

You leap again for the stomach wall, but this time an immense force from outside causes it to leap back toward you, and you go sailing across the lake of acid and collide with the leftover sludge from the digested cheeseburger. "No!" You think, you think as your eyes fill with frustrated tears, "I had it that time!" Your splashdown releases some gas bubbles and the sphincter opens, sucking air back up the esophagus.

Outside:

Sean felt his belly gurgle, gas build up and: "BRAAAAAAAAAAAPPP!!!!" He burped the best one of the day! Sean laughed crudely and turned off the shower. Still smiling for that victory and thinking about the awesome baseball practice that was now unfortunately over, he headed for his room.
122221.title: You try to escape

1222212.content:
You leap upward and look around. "Yep. Still in an older kid's tummy." You think. "That should be obvious, Timmy." The boy's stomach rumbles in agreement. Outside, you hear a muffled burp and the stomach shakes as if your captor is laughing.

Now your frustration has given way to anger with the unfairness of being shrunk and trapped in a 12-year-old boy's belly, while he obliviously goes on with his life. You charge the stomach wall, ramming it at full speed and rebounding back into the acid. You scream with frustration and thrash around, trying to get to your feet while sending waves across the organ in every direction.

You get to your feet and the exact same thing happens, and again you throw a tantrum, though this time when you get to your feet you throw in some stomping and kicking at the acid for good measure, as the stomach gurgles in alarm. You are unaware that not all the churning you see in the acid is caused by you...

Outside:

Sean enters his room, puts on a pair of boxers and some shorts, and is about to flop on his bed and play some DS when he begins to feel a tad... queasy. He gently rubs his flat belly, which gurgles in displeasure and he decides he does not like this feeling. But it's nothing that some cookies won't fix!

Inside:

Your rage spent, you sink down against the stomach wall to have a good cry. You wonder if your parents have called the police to report your disappearance. You hope they haven't blamed your brother, who sometimes picked on you like all brothers but was otherwise good to you.

You are splashed with a wave of acid and you look up. Strangely, though you have ceased your shenanigans, the stomach acid is still churning. The stomach walls lurch suddenly, then again, and you jump to your feet, wondering what is happening. You see the sphincter opening, and churning doubles in strength as the stomach lurches more and more.

"Oh." You say.

Outside:

Halfway to the kitchen, Sean realizes that the churning in his belly isn't from hunger, it's nausea. That cheeseburger must not have been cooked all the way, though it's strange why it took so long to protest. He bolts for the bathroom, throwing open the toilet lid and bending down as he retches...

Inside:

The stomach gives a massive lurch and you are catapulted up toward the open sphincter. You cheer, trying not to think about what exactly is happening right now.
1222212.title: Timmy renews his efforts

12222121.content:
You're passing through the 12-year-old's esophagus again, but this time instead of being massaged gently downward, you're rocketing upward behind the rest of his stomach contents. It's kind of like a ride. Powered by puke. But there's no time to be disgusted, for you rocket out of the throat and under the uvula, slide across the tongue, barely clear the teeth and are now in a freefall. You really don't want to end up in the toilet you're plummeting toward, so you twist and contort your body and are miraculously able to catch the outer edge of the seat. However, your body, still covered in stomach juices, causes you lose your grip and you fall onto a rug on the bathroom floor. You lie there and catch your breath, smelling the sweet air of freedom and ignoring the fading odor of the older boy's innards.

Speaking of the older boy, you hear a groan and open your eyes to see the massive 12-year-old baseball player lean back against the wall of the bathroom, clutching his stomach. His bare feet sit to either side of you like massive monoliths, and you can see that you're only slightly bigger than his big toes. His eyes are closed and he makes no indication of seeing you, but you know he will soon recover and see you.

From what little you've seen of him, you know he has a crude sense of humor, like all boys, but has seemed fairly good-hearted so far. But he may not be happy if he knows that you were in his stomach.
12222121.title: You make it out!

choices: Sean's a good kid, he'll help you
Sean's a little selfish, you'll be fun to keep here
122221211.content:
There's no reason to be afraid of him. It's not your fault he swallowed you. Even so, you approach cautiously, sizing him up. His blonde hair is wet for some reason, so apparently he had been taking a bath after practice or something. He's not wearing a shirt, so you can see that although a little short for his age he has a lean and athletic build.

You are standing basically between his thighs looking up at him when his eyes open. They alight on you and widen as his jaw drops to shout "What the-" You wave, inanely, not knowing what else to do, standing there an inch tall still covered in the giant kid's stomach juices. "Hi there. Um, I'm Timmy."

"................Sean." is the response. This is more awkward than you thought it would be. "Um, no offense, but why are you so small and how did you get here?" "I shrunk at practice, and you swallowed me." You answer. "I've been in your stomach since your first cheeseburger. It's a long story." Sean's stomach chooses this moment to butt in, gurgling loudly, upset at its current emptiness.

Sean looks like he doesn't know how to feel with that information. He places his hand on his belly, and asks "You're were in my.... stomach?" a hint of an interested smile appears on his lips. "What was it like?"

"It was hot and wet and it smelled bad." You reply. Sean laughs. "It's a good thing you weren't digested! Nothing else I eat is so lucky, except a penny I swallowed for a dare last month. Food ends up like this:" He sucks in his gut and burps, loudly, before laughing and continuing. "You're also lucky I had to puke! You could've been in there forever!" The initial shock over, his usual sunny disposition is taking over again. Hopefully what you have to say next won't change that.

"Uh, well, that was my fault. I had to get out and I didn't want to try my luck for the other way, so I got your stomach all churned up. Sorry." You 'forget' to say that you weren't trying to get him to throw up, you want to seem like a badass, not a tantrum-throwing baby. Sean looks to the side, thinking about this. You hold your breath, but then he shrugs and looks back. "Pretty smart of you."

Relieved, you ask "I just want to go home. Can you help me?

1222212111.content:
You can tell that Sean is seriously considering helping you, but the fact that that means he is also considering not helping you is unnerving. He looks down finally and smiles toothily. Your heart skips a beat.

"Of course I'll help you, dude. It's the least I can do after eating you." You breathe a sigh of relief. "Thanks, can we go right now?"

Sean shakes his head, and lowers his voice. "Leaving this late will raise questions if my brothers see us, and you don't want them to know about you. I think it's best if as few people as possible know about you. I'll take you home tomorrow." You nod, disappointed but knowing that he is right. "Now, let's get out of this bathroom." Sean stands up and reaches down for you. You shrink back at first, but so far he has given you no reason to not trust him and you allow him to pick you up. It feels weird, the huge fingers firmly but gently holding on to you.

Sean takes you into his room.

"So, what do you want to do until morning?" he asks

He looks around his room and, seeing no other source of heat that won't set you on fire eventually, sighs and very carefully picks you up, placing you on his stomach. "This is weird, but at least you won't die." he mutters.

The body heat seems to do the trick, you stop shivering and Sean turns out the light.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sean's stomach, however, does not sleep. A few hours after Sean drifts off to sleep himself, you are awoken by a gurgling rumble deep beneath you. It's dark and you are on a soft, warm surface that is gurgling. You immediately panic, thinking that you are back inside Sean's belly, but when you see the sheet above you you relax, you're not in his belly you're on his belly. You must have been cold. 12222121111211.content:
Sean POV

Sean chugged that glass of water, gulping it down. He was pretty thirsty and exhausted from the days activities. Sean placed the empty glass on his bedside table and laid back down in his bed. Just what I needed. Sean thought as he yawned. Sean quickly fell back asleep with his hand on his stomach. He could feel his tummy gurgle and slosh with the water he had just drank.

Morning came soon enough as the sunlight came in through Seans window and landed on his face. Stretching his arms, Sean looked down at his abdomen seeing how Timmy slept through the night. "Have a good sleep lil..." Sean started to say as he pulled back the covers, but to his surprise Timmy was gone. Where did he run off too?!? Sean thought worriedly. He searched his bed high and low and still couldn't find the tiny human that he had thrown up the night before. Maybe it was just a dream? Sean thought as he scratched his head.

"Sean! Come get your breakfast!" Seans mom yelled from the kitchen.

"Coming!!!" Sean yelled back. Thinking nothing of the little man again, Sean put on a t-shit and headed downstairs for breakfast.

"Made your favorite!" Seans mom said happily. She placed a plate of pancakes on the table.

"Awesome! Thanks mom!" Sean replied happily as he started eating. "Soume mirlk too preese." Sean said with a mouthful of maple syrup covered pancakes. With a *GULP* the first bite of pancakes went down, which would be followed by many more gulps of food.

Timmy POV

The wonders of Seans stomach. Timmy hoped he wouldn't have to be back in this fleshy confines again, but here we are. Timmy entered Seans stomach with a huge *SPLASH* as Sean had drank quite a bit of the water before Timmy followed it down. Surfacing, Timmy tread the water in Seans stomach only to be pummeled by more raining from above. This forced Timmy back underwater and then there was movement as Sean laid back down to sleep. Waves started spinning Timmy underwater making it difficult for him to resurface for air. The stomach walls seemed to start contracting causing the waves to intensify. Calm... Down... Sean! Timmy thought nervously. He was able to surface every now and then to get a good breath, but a wave of water would smack him in the face and plunge him back into the sea stomachs storm.

It felt like ages before the water seemed to calm down and the stomach walls stopped moving. It was hard for Timmy to make out as it was pitch black in Seans stomach. His eyes hadn't adjusted quite yet to their new, yet familiar surroundings. Now how will I get out. Can't throw another tantrum cause I'm floating... Timmy thought. Seeing as his arms were getting tired, Timmy flipped to float on his back. He stared up into the ceiling of Seans stomach, thinking of what he could do. He thought and thought, trying to come up with a plan, but Timmys eyes were starting to get heavy. There was a constant rocking motion by just laying in the sea of water within Seans stomach. Stomach walls must still be moving a little. Timmy thought as he yawned. He could hear Seans breathing as well. Every breath was long and deep, with an occasionally grunt noise, which Timmy assumed was Sean snoring. Timmy started counting in his had how long it took Sean to take a breath in and out. In: 1...2...3...4 Out: 5....6...7...8 In: 1...2..... Just like counting sheep, Timmy was out within a couple minutes; sleeping and floating in the endless sea within Sean.

Near morning Sean's stomach started contracting again. Gurgles and squelch noises started happening regularly, but Timmy was still sound asleep. A low slurping sound started near the back of Seans stomach. Slowly the sea of water was being sucked into Sens duodenum, which would then begin Timmys adventure deeper into Sean, if he was sucked in. Timmy was still just floating in the water as he got closer and closer to the sphincter muscle that was sucking the water in. Suddenly, the world within Sean shifted, causing Timmy to wake up just into time to get a big breath in. Not this again! Timmy thought as he was pushed and tossed by the waves within Seans stomach. Having gone through it once before Timmy had an easier time of staying on top of he water and riding the waves instead of having them push him under.

A loud slurping sound came from behind Timmy. Looking back Timmy could just make out some sort of hole that was sucking up the liquid he was floating in. I don't think I wanna go that way... Timmy thought nervously. Then, the water within Seans stomach started rocking back and forth. "Coming!!!" is what Timmy thought he heard Sean say. Sean's on the move. Timmy thought as he fought to stay afloat in the stomachs sea. The back and forth movements seemed to push Timmy closer to the sphincter behind him as the sucking sound was overwhelming. Since most of the water seemed to have exited deeper into Sean, Timmy was able to swim away from the sucking source. He got to about the middle of Seans stomach when...

*PLOP*

Something big landed in front of Timmy causing him to be swept back toward the slurping sphincter. What was that?!? Timmy thought. Looking up he saw another round muscle starting to close, and then.

*PLOP*

It opened again! Is he eating?!?! Timmy thought worriedly. More food started to rain down, along with some kind of liquid. It was enough to make the liquid rise in Seans stomach to make the slurping noise intensify, now seeming to suck every last drop into his bowels. The current was to strong to swim, though Timmy kept doing his best. Taking a quick look behind Timmy saw the maw of the sphincter muscle open, taking in everything thing it could. There has to be something I can do?!?! Timmy thought. Looking around he saw a piece of food the Sean was eating floating towards him. If I can make it to that, I might be safe! Timmy thought. Using all of his might, Timmy started swimming toward the mushed up piece of pancake, but Sean stomach was making it very difficult to get there. The sucking seemed to intensify as Timmy tried swimming away from it, as if it wanted to force Timmy deeper into Sean.

1441112.content:
The boy grabs his bottle of gatorade and chugs. He's thirsty from his run around the bases. This deluge splashes over you, fortunately diluting some of the stomach acid in the process. As it turns out, this is for the worst - it just gives you longer to contemplate your slow, agonizing digestion inside the tummy of your teammate. He plops his sweaty bum on the bench and leans back against the cinder block wall of the dugout, his cleats dangling below him. He lifts his shirt, exposing his flat belly. The boy who's been subjected to the smells of your digestion sits next to him and gives him a high five. How curious - he thinks he can almost see some jiggling coming from the flat belly of his friend. He's caught staring by the boy you're inside.
"Take a picture, Luke. It'll last longer." says the boy as he rubs his belly.
"Oh - sorry, Colton. I thought I saw something weird for a second," Luke says, embarrassed. Colton's puzzled look prompts Luke to continue. "It looks like there was something..."
"LUKE YOU'RE UP!" yells the coach.
And with that, the conversation is over. You'd been hearing this with a stubborn, growing hope, but as soon as Luke runs off, you give up.
Of course, the digestion doesn't relent. The diluted acid still works on your flesh, making it burn and blister. It's starting to feel rubbery and thin. Of course, the sensation is still maddeningly painful.
Feeling the gatorade running through him, Colton trots off to the portapotty by the fence. You hear him working straps and his cup and pants and then a steady stream of urine hitting the blue mess below. After he sighs in relief, Colton peers curiously into the pot. A fit of giggles sparks your curiosity. "Eww... gross. Nasty! That thing is huge!" You can only imagine, but the thought gives you a sinking feeling. That's exactly what will become of you. After tidying back up, he heads over to the bench, giggling at the sweaty butt print he'd left behind. Luke is next to it, his head hung low.
"It's all right dude," Colton says. "Everybody strikes out every once in a while. Hey - I just saw something that will cheer you up. Or at least make you laugh. Go look in the portapot."
Three burps later, the stomach acid feels like it's returned full force. Your screaming is stifled by the sounds of practice. Colton jumps up and hollers a couple of times, cheering on some good plays. A couple of seconds later, you hear Luke's voice again. "Dude!... Ugh! It was GREEN!"
"And it was huge, too! Did you see the size of it?"
The boys giggle and Colton lets out another burp. This time, intentionally blowing it in Luke's face.
"Dude! That's sick! What did you eat?" Luke is stifling his laughter.
"I dunno. It's weird. I've been burping a lot. Oh well - whatever it is, we both know what it'll look like soon enough. Think I could top the size of that floater in there?"
"No way!"
"Wanna bet a card?!"
"You're on! But I gotta warn you - if you think my burps stink, watch out - I can clear the house with my farts! Haha"
This is unbearable. You wish it would just end. Now, you realize, not only will you be digested by Colton. Not only will you be reduced to his poop, but you're going to be examined by him and his friend. You don't even get the dignity of a quiet, forgotten disposal. You don't want to imagine yourself as a turd. This is freaky. But as a wave of acid splashes in your face and up your nose, you earnestly wish you could fast forward to that result. Being a big morning dump doesn't hurt; becoming it sure does. You hope to die, but don't. Eventually, your pain ebbs away as you feel your body falling apart and melting.

As you digest, the new friends plan a sleepover. They go their separate ways, and you go into Colton's intestine. His bile squirts on your liquefied body to help process you. As you slither through the coils of his gut, the loud sounds make him grin. Why are you still alive and aware of every sound, sensation, and smell? Soon enough, you're slopped into his colon along with a huge amount of digested breakfast and lunch. No...This can't be real! Why are you still alive? You regret wishing to rush digestion along. This is almost worse than being digested! It doesn't hurt anymore, having no nerves or body, but feeling yourself becoming someone else's poop, smelling yourself get more and more repulsive as bacteria work on you and turn your bile stained greenish-yellow slurry into a more familiar brown, being gripped by his cylindrical bowels and starting to form into that shape... it's all too much!
The boys reunite and gorge on junk food pretty much all night long. Colton occasionally lifts his pajama shirt and pats his belly, letting out monstrous belches, getting more laughter from Luke. You remember the smell of his belches, almost quaintly. It was nothing compared to this fetor. Feeling like sharing, Colton clenches his gut and expels a very squeaky fart. To your horror. You hear Luke sputter and gag.

info.brief_description: You go to the ballpark for your little league baseball practice when you shrink to 1 inch
info.description:
You are Timmy and you are 7 years old. Today is your first practice as a little league baseball player. You are so excited and can't wait. You get to the ballpark a little early. Your mom leaves you with your older brother and says she will pick you up after practice. Your brother walks off and you begin to feel funny after drinking what you thought was gatorade that your mom had bought at this old shop near the park.

Characters:
Timmy, 7 years old, Loves to play sports
Jacob, !2 years old, Your older brother
Timmy baseball teammates
Ray, 26 years old, Timmy's Coach

Rules:
No Interaction with females
Timmy is immortal so he can't die
Please be creative and detailed, no one sentence chapters. Chapters need to be at least a paragraph long.
He may come in contact with animals
He may come in contact with anyone at the ballpark as long as they are male

Gift points will be given for good chapters.

Hope you enjoy!!
